meanings.definition: A highway system connecting major cities in the United States.
meanings.sent1: The interstates make it easy to travel between big cities.
meanings.sent2: We drove on the interstates to get from New York to Los Angeles.
meanings.sent3: The interstates are like giant ribbons tying cities together.
meanings.sent4: She thought of the interstates as veins carrying traffic across the country.
meanings.sent5: The interstates are the lifelines of city-to-city travel.
